text:
@BorisJohnson I see your about to making a u turn on wearing masks,
Whilst you're highly incompedent, 
No mask is needed "Hancock and Prof Dum, Witty", 
What unbelievable advice, that has caused many tens of thousands of people to get the Coronavirus infections,
Complicity to Murder, Sadly.
